Name: Unit Down
About the game: A strategic yet fast-paced arcade-styled shooter featuring permadeath. Follow the story of 4 self-proclaimed heroes as they fight the injustice of the 'Earth Unit' - a collaborative government created by the people of Earth in an effort to keep their dying planet from becoming nothing but a memory. • Arcade-styled shooter action with a unique upgrade system! • Real-time strategy overworld map that runs non-stop while you play! • Randomized enemy placements, spawns, and upgrade chips! • Fully voiced dialogue with an impactful atmosphere and colorful characters! • Neato blips and beeps as sound effects! • Unique and engaging boss battles, each with vivid personalities! • Neato blips and beeps, in case you didn't catch that! Your support is what drives this game! Come like the official Unit Down page on Facebook and join in the conversation! The dev would love to hear from you, and suggestions are strongly encouraged! Thank you for your support!
